title: Looking for fonts with a Myriad-like "y"
content:
I am looking for fonts that have a curved Y like myriad. Any suggestions to help expediate my search is appreciated. I'm working on a logo that ends with "y" and starts with "c" and I would like to somewhat mimic the curve of the "c" with the curve of the "y" at the end

Example of the y:  
 [http://www.imgdumb.com/images/536124Myriad-y.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107165001/http:/www.imgdumb.com/images/536124Myriad-y.gif "http://www.imgdumb.com/images/536124Myriad-y.gif")
author: voiceof

comments.content: [FF Speak](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107165001/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_speak_ot/&sample_text=coy%20&sample_size=96) (you'd want to adjust the kerning a bit)
